关于Ubuntu20.04安装arm-linux-gcc发生的错误
item.description: <p>ubuntu20.04 安装 arm-linux-gcc 发生错误:libpng3 : Depends: libpng12-0 (&gt;= 1.2.5.0-2) but it is not installed <img data-src="https://cdn.assets.taoidle.com/gh/taoidle/taoidle.github.io@master/assets/images/wp_editor_md_ffc711dadcd44f60ffc78cf327cc4886.jpg" alt="" /> 解决方法：</p> <figure class="highlight shell"><figcaption data-lang="Bash"></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">sudo</span> add-apt-repository ppa:linuxuprising/libpng12</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">sudo</span> <span class="token function">apt</span> update</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="5"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">sudo</span> <span class="token function">apt</span> list --upgradable</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="6"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="7"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">sudo</span> <span class="token function">apt</span> --fix-broken <span class="token function">install</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="8"></td><td><pre></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="9"></td><td><pre><span class="token function">sudo</span> <span class="token function">apt</span> <span class="token function">install</span> gcc-arm-linux-gnueabi</pre></td></tr></table></figure>
